title: Mary Shellley's Elecrtifying Experience
background: Mary Shelley opened a medical practice specializing in re-animation of the dead. During the first month of operation (March 2012), the business, titled Mary Shelley, Limited Liability Corporation (LLC.), experienced the events shown below.
instructions: Record the transactions in the journal of Mary Shelley, LLC. List the transactions by date. Select transaction in list, then enter values in General Journal below.

events.item: Shelley invested $59,000 in the business, which in turn issued its common stock to her.
The business paid cash for land costing $37,000. Shelley plans to build an office building on the land.
The business purchased medical supplies for $1,700 on account.
Mary Shelley, LLC., officially opened for business.
During the rest of the month, Shelley treated patients and earned service revenue of $11,600, receiving cash for half the revenue earned.
